item.title: The Man Called Noon
item.description: The Man Called Noon is a 1973 film directed by Peter Collinson. It stars Richard Crenna and Stephen Boyd. It is based on a 1970 Louis L'Amour novel of the same name.

item.title: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven
item.description: Twenty Thousand Dollars for Seven is a 1969 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone and starring Brett Halsey.

item.title: Viva Cangaceiro
item.description: Viva Cangaceiro is a Brazilian themed spaghetti western movie co-produced by Spain and Italy and directed by Giovanni Fago as his third and last spaghetti western.

item.title: La magnifica sfida
item.description: La magnifica sfida or Falcon of the Desert is a 1965 Italian adventure film directed by Miguel Lluch.

item.title: The Relentless Four
item.description: The Relentless Four or I quattro inesorabili is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film in Eastmancolor directed by Primo Zeglio.

item.title: Those Dirty Dogs
item.description: Those Dirty Dogs is a 1973 Italian-Spanish-American Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Giuseppe Rosati and starring Gianni Garko and Stephen Boyd. The film was made towards the very end of the spaghetti western boom. As such it features such latter-day genre elements as self-parody, guffaw humour, near-slapstick fight scenes, machine guns hidden in everyday household items, and bombastic villains.

item.title: Der Mann aus El Paso
item.description: Der Mann aus El Paso ist ein Western im Stil der italienischen Filme des Genres, der von Peter Collinson in spanisch-britisch-italienischer Koproduktion nach dem Roman „The Man Called Noon“ von Louis L’Amour inszeniert wurde. Er lief am 30. August 1973 im deutschen Sprachraum an.

item.title: 20.000 dollari sporchi di sangue
item.description: 20.000 dollari sporchi di sangue ist der Titel eines im deutschsprachigen Raums nicht aufgeführten Italowestern von Alberto Cardone aus dem Jahr 1968.
